msg.msgText:
A "LogAutoTransfer" composite object can be created using the "create" option of the "imaserver" command. The "LogAutoTransfer" composite object defines the settings that are used for automatic log transfers.
SYNTAX: imaserver create LogAutoTransfer help imaserver create LogAutoTransfer "Item1=value1" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver create LogAutoTransfer "Destination=ftp://192.168.56.1" "UserID=test" "Password=xxxx"
Configuration items for the "LogAutoTransfer" object: Destination The URL to connect to the FTP or SSH server, including protocol. Port The port to access the server. The default value for FTP server is 21. The default value for SSH server is 22. UserID The user ID to use to log in to the server. Password The password to use to log in to the server. Enabled Whether automatic log transfers are enabled. Options:True,False. Default:True.
